physical_appearance: This is an embroidered kanjari blouse. It is red, featuring multicolored embroided diamond and floral patterns across the body. In the center, there is a black panel. The sleeves feature a brocade panel.
sgcool_label_text: Blouse worn by the Jain community of eastern Kutch. The sleeves of the blouse are made of brocade, while the rest is covered in fine embroidery.
subject_terms_1: folk costume embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) lozenges blouses (main garments) tops (garments, general)
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Blouses Embroidery Brocade Motifs Jains
